column5: I have done some research on six mile lake because we are renting a cottage up there next summer, i would like to know some more information on the pike and what are the best bays for pike ( i have a map).
Look for weedy bays that open up to deeper water.. you'll do just fine.
I know where the big perch hang out in the winter time..
I cought a perch about that size in the exact same spot last winter.  They get huge on the six eh..  As for pike.  Just look for weeds.
